parameters.name: visible

conditions.name: changed

conditions.description: Event triggered when switch is pressed

parameters.name: enabled

parameters.description: A time object can't be visible. Always false.
parameters.name: visible

parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Unique ID identifying the Input/Output in calaos-server
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Internal graphical type for all calaos objects. Set automatically, read-only parameter.
parameters.name: gui_type

parameters.description: Hour for this time input
parameters.name: hour

parameters.description: Minutes for this time input
parameters.name: min

parameters.description: Seconds for this time input
parameters.name: sec

parameters.name: month

parameters.name: year

conditions.name: changed

conditions.name: true

InputTimer.description: Timer object. trigger an event after the configured time has expired.

parameters.description: Auto restart the timer when time expires
parameters.name: autorestart

parameters.description: Seconds for the timer interval
parameters.name: sec

parameters.description: Enable the Input/Output. The default value is true. This parameter is added if it's not found in the configuration.
parameters.name: enabled

parameters.description: A timer object can't be visible. Always false.
parameters.name: visible

parameters.description: Name of Input/Output.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Unique ID identifying the Input/Output in calaos-server
parameters.name: id

parameters.name: gui_type

parameters.description: Hour for the timer interval
parameters.name: hour

parameters.description: Minutes for the timer interval
parameters.name: min

parameters.description: Miliseconds for the timer interval
parameters.name: msec

parameters.name: autostart

conditions.description: Event triggered on any change
conditions.name: change

conditions.description: Event triggered when timer starts
conditions.name: false

conditions.description: Event triggered when timer expires
conditions.name: true

actions.description: Reset the configured time to a value. Format is h:m:s:ms

InternalBool.description: Internal boolean object. This object is useful for doing internal programing in rules, like keeping boolean states, or displaying boolean values

parameters.description: Automatically save the value in cache. The value will be reloaded when restarting calaos is true. Default to false
parameters.name: save

parameters.description: Enable edit mode for this object. It allows user to modify the value on interfaces. Default to false
parameters.name: rw

parameters.description: Internal graphical type for all calaos objects. Set automatically, read-only parameter.
parameters.name: gui_type

parameters.description: Unique ID identifying the Input/Output in calaos-server
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Name of Input/Output.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Display the Input/Output on all user interfaces if set. Default to true
parameters.name: visible

parameters.description: Enable the Input/Output. The default value is true. This parameter is added if it's not found in the configuration.
parameters.name: enabled

conditions.description: Event when value is false
conditions.name: false

conditions.description: Event on any change of value
conditions.name: changed

conditions.description: Event when value is true
conditions.name: true

actions.description:
Do an impulse on boolean value with a pattern.
Ex: 500 200 500 200 means: TRUE for 500ms, FALSE for 200ms, TRUE for 500ms, FALSE for 200ms
Ex: 500 loop 200 300 means: TRUE for 500ms, then loop the next steps for infinite, FALSE for 200ms, TRUE for 300ms
Ex: 100 100 200 old means: blinks and then set to the old start state (before impulse starts)
actions.name: impulse 500 200 500 200

actions.description: Do an impulse on boolean value. Set to true for X ms then reset to false
actions.name: impulse 200

InternalInt.description: Internal number object. This object is useful for doing internal programing in rules, like counters, of displaying values.

parameters.description: Automatically save the value in cache. The value will be reloaded when restarting calaos is true. Default to false
parameters.name: save

parameters.description: Enable edit mode for this object. It allows user to modify the value on interfaces. Default to false
parameters.name: rw

parameters.description: Set a step for increment/decrement value. Default is 1.0
parameters.name: step

parameters.name: enabled

conditions.description: Event on any change of value
conditions.name: changed

conditions.description: Event on a specific number value

MySensorsInputAnalog.description: Analog measurement with MySensors node An analog input can be used to read analog values to display them and use them in rules.

parameters.description: Internal graphical type for all calaos objects. Set automatically, read-only parameter.
parameters.name: gui_type

parameters.description: Unique ID identifying the Input/Output in calaos-server
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Sampling time in microsecond. The value is read at this frequency. If this value is not set, calaos tries to read the interval parameter
parameters.name: frequency

parameters.description: use in conjunction of coeff_b to apply equation of the form `value_displayed = coeff_a * raw_value + coeff_b`. Default value is 1.0.
parameters.name: coeff_a

parameters.description: Sensor ID, as set in your node
parameters.name: sensor_id

parameters.description: Node ID as set in your network
parameters.name: node_id

parameters.description: Name of Input/Output.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Sampling time in seconds. The value is read at this frequency. If this value is not set, the default value is 15s
parameters.name: interval

parameters.description: use in conjunction of coeff_a to apply equation of the form `value_displayed = coeff_a * raw_value + coeff_b`. Default value is 0.0
parameters.name: coeff_b

parameters.description: Enable the Input/Output. The default value is true. This parameter is added if it's not found in the configuration.
parameters.name: enabled

parameters.description: Display the Input/Output on all user interfaces if set. Default to true
parameters.name: visible

parameters.description: same as coeff_b, can be used alone. Default value is 0.0
parameters.name: offset

conditions.description: Event on any change of value
conditions.name: changed

conditions.name: value

PingInputSwitch.description: A switch input based on the result of a ping command. Useful to detect presence of a host on the network. Basic switch with press/release states.

parameters.name: interval

parameters.description: Timeout of the ping request in ms
parameters.name: timeout

parameters.description: Internal graphical type for all calaos objects. Set automatically, read-only parameter.
parameters.name: gui_type

parameters.description: Unique ID identifying the Input/Output in calaos-server
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Name of Input/Output.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: A switch can't be visible. Always false.
parameters.name: visible

parameters.description: IP address or host where to send the ping
parameters.name: host

parameters.description: Enable the Input/Output. The default value is true. This parameter is added if it's not found in the configuration.
parameters.name: enabled

conditions.description: The host is offline and/or does not respond to the ping
conditions.name: false

conditions.description: Event on any change of state
conditions.name: changed

conditions.description: The host is online and respond to the ping
conditions.name: true

WITemp.description: Temperature measurement with Wago temperature module (like 750-460) Temperature sensor input. Use for displaying temperature and to control heating devices with rules based on temperature value

parameters.description: PLC address of the input sensor
parameters.name: var

parameters.description: Wago PLC IP address on the network
parameters.name: host

parameters.description: Internal graphical type for all calaos objects. Set automatically, read-only parameter.
parameters.name: gui_type

parameters.description: Unique ID identifying the Input/Output in calaos-server
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Sampling time in microsecond. The value is read at this frequency. If this value is not set, calaos tries to read the interval parameter
parameters.name: frequency

parameters.description: use in conjunction of coeff_b to apply equation of the form `value_displayed = coeff_a * raw_value + coeff_b`. Default value is 1.0.
parameters.name: coeff_a

parameters.description: Name of Input/Output.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Sampling time in seconds. The value is read at this frequency. If this value is not set, the default value is 15s
parameters.name: interval

parameters.description: use in conjunction of coeff_a to apply equation of the form `value_displayed = coeff_a * raw_value + coeff_b`. Default value is 0.0
parameters.name: coeff_b

parameters.description: Wago ethernet port, default to 502
parameters.name: port

parameters.description: Enable the Input/Output. The default value is true. This parameter is added if it's not found in the configuration.
parameters.name: enabled

parameters.description: Display the Input/Output on all user interfaces if set. Default to true
parameters.name: visible

parameters.description: same as coeff_b, can be used alone. Default value is 0.0
parameters.name: offset

conditions.description: Event on any change of temperature value
conditions.name: changed

conditions.description: Event on a temperature value in °C
conditions.name: value
